name: Ip Man
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Born and raised in the years between the two world wars, young Ip Man (Kevin Cheng) finds his luck in the martial arts arenas of Canton. There, he meets the first Wing Chun Master, Fung-Kau (Rongguang Yu), and his childhood love Cheung Wing-sing (Cecila Han). But with the start of a civil war, Ip Man's life both in the arena and at home begin to fall apart.
about_the_game: Born and raised in the years between the two world wars, young Ip Man (Kevin Cheng) finds his luck in the martial arts arenas of Canton. There, he meets the first Wing Chun Master, Fung-Kau (Rongguang Yu), and his childhood love Cheung Wing-sing (Cecila Han). But with the start of a civil war, Ip Man's life both in the arena and at home begin to fall apart.
short_description: Born and raised in the years between the two world wars, young Ip Man (Kevin Cheng) finds his luck in the martial arts arenas of Canton. There, he meets the first Wing Chun Master, Fung-Kau (Rongguang Yu), and his childhood love Cheung Wing-sing (Cecila Han).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
